newsitem.title: POLAND: Swarzedz falls on PLN 28.5 mln Sept loss.
newsitem.headline: Swarzedz falls on PLN 28.5 mln Sept loss.

text.p: The Polish furniture maker Swarzedz SA, Friday's biggest main market loser, fell 7.7 percent to 7.2 zlotys in thin 0.1-million-zloty trade after showing a September loss of 28.5 million zlotys, traders said.
"It's obviously the market's reaction for the huge loss and the stock is likely to fall further and in higher turnover," one trader said.
Swarzedz reported a loss of 28.5 million zlotys in September and a loss of 34.1 million zlotys in the January-September period.
